[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”3.22.3″][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”About Us” text_orientation=”center” button_one_url=”#” _builder_version=”3.19″ title_font=”||||||||” title_text_align=”center” content_font=”||||||||” background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.5)” background_image=”https://basset.com.my/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/image-1.png” background_blend=”overlay”][/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22.3″][et_pb_row custom_padding_tablet=”||0px” custom_padding_phone=”||0px|” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” padding_1_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”3.22.3″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.19″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19″ text_font=”||||||||” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”80%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding_tablet=”||0px|” custom_padding_phone=”||0px|” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Basset Sdn. Bhd.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.22.3″ custom_padding=”36px|||||”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.19″][et_pb_text module_class=”center-text-mobile” _builder_version=”3.22.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” text_orientation=”center” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”36px|||||”]

Basset Sdn Bhd was established more than a decade ago as a manufacturing facility for a printed circuit boards (“PCB”) Assembly. With a strong reputation for precision, reliability and engineering expertise in this field, Basset has established itself as a one-stop destination for PCB Assembly with world class quality management system. In keeping with its commitment to professional manufacturing practices, Basset obtained the ISO 9001:2000 certification in 2001 and currently certified with ISO 9001: 2015.

Basset has the facilities, the capability and the technical expertise for the full range of PCBs.

Surface Mount Technology (SMT)

Plastic Injection Moulding

Pad printing up to four colors[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.19″][et_pb_image src=”https://basset.com.my/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/ISO-9001-2015.png” _builder_version=”3.22.4″ max_width_tablet=”70%” max_width_phone=”90%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.19″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.5)” background_image=”https://basset.com.my/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/image-1.png” background_blend=”overlay” global_module=”88″ saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.22.3″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.19″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19″ text_font=”||||||||” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark”]

Get In Touch

Find out how we can fulfill your printed circuit board needs. Contact us today!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://basset.com.my/contact-us/” button_text=”Contact Us” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”3.19″ background_layout=”dark”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
